sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading down 0.0%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble Company registers a 1.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 8.7%.
Caterpillar is lower by about 1.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are 3M ( MMM ), trading down 2.2%, and Travelers Companies ( TRV ), trading down 0.1% on the day.
